scripts.frontmatter:
echo '---
title: Pathfinding Visualizer
layout: null
---
' | cat - ../mrodriguez648.github.io/pathfinding-visualizer/index.html > temp && mv temp ../mrodriguez648.github.io/pathfinding-visualizer/index.html
scripts.gitcommitmaster: git -C ../mrodriguez648.github.io/ add -A && git -C ../mrodriguez648.github.io/ commit -m 'React app updated, see https://github.com/mrodriguez648/react-pathfinding-visualizer/commits/master' && git -C ../mrodriguez648.github.io/ push -u origin master
scripts.deploy: npm run purge && npm run frontmatter && npm run gitcommitmaster
